alert.note: Alert for Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 8:08PM CDT until August 08 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Otter Tail County in west central Minnesota... Eastern Wilkin County in west central Minnesota... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 808 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rothsay, or 14 miles northwest of Fergus Falls, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fergus Falls, Pelican Rapids, Rothsay, Underwood, Dalton, Elizabeth and Erhard. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 34 and 65. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
